channel.description: Recent content in tl;dr on Cryspen Blog

item.title: TL;DR - Hybrid Public Key Encryption
item.description: HPKE, defined in RFC 9180, is a CFRG standard that describes a scheme for hybrid public key encryption. It is co-authored by my Cryspen co-founder Karthikeyan Bhargavan and one of his PhD students Benjamin Lipp as part of his research at Inria.
